title: Adun Oakenshield

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate any two of the following choices each night: (Black), (Red), (Green)
- (Black)(Red)(Green): Resurrect target player at the end of this night. Your defense is forcefully set to None while using this.
- (1) Attack a target each night.

desc:
Post 1887
*“… And at his passing, the bodies of the world’s great warriors shall rise from their graves and follow him to battle.”*
